name: AdAway
description: An open-source ad blocker for Android using host file modification.

name: Aliucord
description: A Discord client mod for Android that adds various enhancements and customization options.

name: Aurora Store
description: An open-source Google Play Store client providing a privacy-friendly alternative to download apps.

name: Aves gallery
description: A powerful Android gallery and metadata explorer with various customization features.

name: Calculator You
description: A stylish, feature-rich calculator app focused on user experience and customization.

name: Droidify
description: A user-friendly alternative F-Droid client with a modern UI and additional features.

name: Termux
description: A terminal emulator for Android that provides a Linux environment and package manager.

name: Amaze File Manager
description: A simple, light, and smooth open-source file manager with Material Design.

name: NewPipe
description: A lightweight YouTube front-end that allows video downloading and ad-free playback.

name: LibreTorrent
description: A minimal yet powerful torrent client for Android, built with Material Design.
